/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the grandeur and scale of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene.

The street itself is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban buildings that flank it. These structures vary in height and design, reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars can be seen driving along the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene.

The image is slightly distorted due to the fisheye lens used, which adds a unique perspective and depth to the photograph. Despite this distortion, the image provides a detailed and vivid depiction of a day in the life of a busy street in Beijing.
